channel.title: Comments on: A quick look at Windows Phone 7 development
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: jinete
item.dc:creator: jinete
item.description: If the emulator is running slow you probably need to enabled VM Hardware Integration in the Bios(or something like that depending on your manufacturer). Once I made this change my emulator ran much much faster. As an added bonus I noticed vmware running better as well.
item.content:encoded: If the emulator is running slow you probably need to enabled VM Hardware Integration in the Bios(or something like that depending on your manufacturer). Once I made this change my emulator ran much much faster. As an added bonus I noticed vmware running better as well.

item.title: By: Amit R.
item.dc:creator: Amit R.
item.description: Great work! I liked it.<br /> Thanks for the brief information.<br />
item.content:encoded:
Great work! I liked it.
Thanks for the brief information.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Paul, it is on a fairly new laptop<br /> 64 bit Windows 7, 4GB or RAM and 2.66 GHz Core 2 Duo
item.content:encoded:
Paul, it is on a fairly new laptop
64 bit Windows 7, 4GB or RAM and 2.66 GHz Core 2 Duo

item.title: By: paul
item.dc:creator: paul
item.description: can you give some specs on the system you are developing on? i tried this ona year old pc and the emulator really sucks on it. im also running Xp.
item.content:encoded: can you give some specs on the system you are developing on? i tried this ona year old pc and the emulator really sucks on it. im also running Xp.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Yeah, the sad part is that they have cool internal names and then when they release it it becomes Windows <..> Foundation instead of Indigo.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, the sad part is that they have cool internal names and then when they release it it becomes Windows <..> Foundation instead of Indigo.

item.title: By: chaospandion
item.dc:creator: chaospandion
item.description: I know this has been said to death but Microsoft does not know how to come up with a good name.
item.content:encoded: I know this has been said to death but Microsoft does not know how to come up with a good name.
